title: Ticket #3485: EC2 spot instances on hold for bad SSH keypair IDs can't be removed.
description:
Specifying a keypair ID that doesn't exist causes a spot request to go on hold. When attempting to remove the job, the grid manager goes from GM_SPOT_CHECK to GM_SPOT_START instead of GM_DELETE, which causes the job to go back on hold.

This problem does not affect dedicated instances, which properly transfer from GM_SEEK_INSTANCE_ID to GM_DELETE when the job is removed.
